P

PasswordResetService - Class in com.group12.service
Service class for password reset functionality This service provides methods for creating a password reset token for a user, sending a password reset email, and validating the password reset token.
PasswordResetService() - Constructor for class com.group12.service.PasswordResetService
Default constructor for PasswordResetService.
PasswordResetService(JavaMailSender, PasswordResetTokenRepository) - Constructor for class com.group12.service.PasswordResetService
Constructs a new PasswordResetService with specified mail sender and token repository.
PasswordResetToken - Class in com.group12.entity
Entity class representing a password reset token.
PasswordResetToken() - Constructor for class com.group12.entity.PasswordResetToken
Constructs a new PasswordResetToken with no parameters.
PasswordResetToken(String, User) - Constructor for class com.group12.entity.PasswordResetToken
Constructs a new PasswordResetToken with a specified token and user.
PasswordResetTokenRepository - Interface in com.group12.repository
Repository interface for PasswordResetToken entities.
